2025.title: Fujitsu Private GPT
2025.description: Fujitsu Private GPT is a fully operational and complete AI solution to help businesses overcome the specialized and costly infrastructure hurdles associated with building a business case for AI.

2025.title: Khasm Labs Telco AI Cloud pilot
2025.description: Telco AI Cloud pilot showcases a production-ready, agentic AI solution for pedestrian safety, making urban safety proactive and scalable and proving that real-time edge AI can be seamlessly integrated into everyday city management.
